programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin
programme.desc: Marissa and Ellice are best friends who hail from different worlds: Ellice is from an influential family, while Marissa is a simple lass living with her mother Lucing. The two are inseparable until one night, a gruesome crime changes their destinies.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Two strangers' lives become entwined after they both return from apparent death due to a road crash.

programme.title: The Breakup Playlist
programme.desc: What if you have a dream, and it leads you to love? Trixie, a law student and hopeful musician, catches the attention of rock star Gino Avila at a music camp. He invites her to be part of his band. Trixie and Gino's connection through music develops into something more.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 6
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 2
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 13
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 5
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back‚Äîeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back‚Äîeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 6
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: For the Love ep 3
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 6
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.desc: GMA's weekend musical comedy variety show that showcases a fun musical experience.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Becoming Pinoy Special: Talilo
programme.desc: The special episode of 'Becoming Pinoy' features, 'Talilo', the Filipino-American rapper known for his powerful storytelling through rap and hip-hop.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Stars On The Floor
programme.desc: The program is set to bring together the biggest names from TV and the digital world, all paired up for the country's biggest dance-collab competition.

programme.title: The Voice Kids
programme.desc: A spin-off of the biggest singing competition, ‚ÄúThe Voice‚Äù. The series features coaches searching for a batch of talented new kids, who could become the Philippines' new child singing superstar.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'The Vigil'
programme.desc: Is about a group of young boys who are undergoing an initiation to be members of a secret organization whom their parents are part of. When they committed an unforgivable sin during the initiation, their punishment must be served with tragic consequences. They find themselves haunted, leading to overwhelming guilt and fear.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally ‚Äúkills‚Äù Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally ‚Äúkills‚Äù Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Manila Boy
programme.desc: Robin, as Manila Boy, played the bad boy image but tries to deviate from it by being a soft-hearted specie among the throngs of the city. He had an open heart for the needy and women were easily charmed by his down-to-earth attitude.

programme.title: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
programme.desc: Joey Perez (Bong Revilla, Jr), a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo.

programme.title: May Daga Sa Labas Ng Lungga
programme.desc: In this sequel to the highly successful \"May Lamok sa Loob ng Kulambo\", it is now Lauro's (Eddie Garcia) turn to doubt his wife Ellen's (Gloria Diaz) fidelity.

programme.title: Anino Sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: Sampung Ahas Ni Eba
programme.desc: A plane wreck leaves a woman Eva (Vivian Velez) alone with ten guys in an island. Each fantasizing about her‚Ä¶ Each wanting her‚Ä¶ Each willing to kill for her.

programme.title: Burlesk Queen
programme.desc: One of the classics of Philippine cinema wherein screen ingenue Vilma Santos made her transition into matured actress. Into this world came the young girl who becomes its last shining star. But as her presence brought life into the old art, her own existence is endangered by the decaying surroundings.

programme.title: Love At First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Balweg
programme.desc: In the war which ensued with the arrival of the military forces, Fr. Balweg was forced out of his parish and into the mountains, where he later became one of the most charismatic of leaders, admired by the masses, hated by the government and loved by many women.

programme.title: Kapitan Tumba
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: D' Godson
programme.desc: A parody of the film The Godfather (1972). A young boy (Ni√±o Muhlach) wants to follow the footsteps of his godfather as a mafia boss by imitating his actions and behavior.

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Pusoy Dos
programme.desc: It is non-stop laughter as Janno Gibbs and Dennis Padilla got together as Billy and Jack, modern-day Robin Hoods who engaged in petty scums to earn money for the upkeep of a day care center for indigent children.

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Ang Paghihiganti Ni David Burdado
programme.desc: After the murder of his parents, the surviving son vows to take the law into his hands.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Campus Girls
programme.desc: Four girls began college together. Along with this new phase in their lives also came major upheavals which nearly wrecked their friendship. The girls discovered that theirs was not a perfect world but there was always hope for tomorrow.

programme.title: Bangkay Mo Akong Hahakbangan
programme.desc: Join the King of Stunts, Dante Varona, on this deadly game on hide and seek and of vengeance and justice.

programme.title: Bahala Na Vs Sputnik
programme.desc: \"Bahala na\" and \"Sigue-Sigue Sputnik\" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.
